title: Threading
description: Threading is a method of hair removal that originated in India. It is a form of hair removal that uses a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the face. Threading is a method of hair removal that originated in India. It is a form of hair removal that uses a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the face.

services.title: Eyebrow Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the eyebrow region of the face.

services.title: Lip Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the upper lip region of the face.

services.title: Lower Lip Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the lower lip region of the face.

services.title: Forehead Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the forehead region of the face.

services.title: Chin Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the chin region of the face.

services.title: Chin + Lower Chin Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the chin and lower chin region of the face.

services.title: Sides Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the sides of the face.

services.title: Neck Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the neck region of the face.

services.title: Full Face Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the full face.

services.title: Full Face + Lower Chin Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the full face and the lower chin region of the face.

services.title: Full Face + Neck Threading
services.description: We use a twisted thread to remove unwanted hair from the full face and neck.
